name: Brain Washer
description: You are inside a poor guy's brain. You are a piece of ass-kicking idea who just wanna smash all the other ideas.  Your goal is to stand still when others are falling apart. Well... the spherical shape that make up the game world probably is the most attractive and accurate 3-D modeling of a internal brain structure. You will definitely not regret to see the super low-poly and conceptual game environment. (More player-friendly features will be added in the future).
